data.name: Viscera Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior
data.detailed_description:
After the battle is over, someone has to cleanup the mess! Introducing Viscera Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior from RuneStorm, a unique crossover mini-game that combines the worlds of Viscera Cleanup Detail and Shadow Warrior. Step into the rubber soled shoes of the hapless janitor tasked with cleaning up Lo Wang's mess after a devastating katana battle in the collector's temple from Shadow Warrior. Mop up pools of blood, dispose of body parts, and get the collector's gallery of antiques in tip top shape as quick as possible! Successfully clean the entire temple and collect all the scattered cash to unlock two Steam achievements!

Viscera Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior is free with purchase of Shadow Warrior.

data.short_description: After the battle is over, someone has to cleanup the mess! Introducing Viscera Cleanup Detail: Shadow Warrior from RuneStorm, a unique crossover mini-game that combines the worlds of Viscera Cleanup Detail and Shadow Warrior.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP SP3
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Shader Model 3.0 Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
